title: Zed in TFT
body: Seriously Zed in TFT is busted. or there is a major bug with him. His clones can create clones and they dont have a timer on them like all the other summons? [image](https://ibb.co/xGnGwsq)

replies.body: Zed does need a nerf.  Higher mana or 5 cost isn't enough to keep him from being too domineering.  Put a mage cap on him and he gets even more insane.  Infinite clones is one thing, but maybe just remove the items cloning, too.  That would at least give people a chance against him.
Intended behavior, that is why they have higher mana.
